name: La Petite Mort (itch)
description:
La Petite Mort is a one of a kind digital erotic experience designed for touch. Its simplistic style and musical design will move you through the sensual and erotic experience, you never thought was possible on a touchscreen.


Designed by Patrick Jarnfelt and Andrea Hasselager with music from 4 prominent Danish composers: Nevin Erönde, Anders Børup, Sidsel Hermansen, Morten Mygind
